snippet: Suzanne Bonamici will serve out the year in Congress, but must win the state's Democratic primary in May and and the general election in November to remain there.
abstract: Suzanne Bonamici will serve out the year in Congress, but must win the state's Democratic primary in May and and the general election in November to remain there.
lead_paragraph: Suzanne Bonamici, the Democrat who won a special House election in Oregon last week, was sworn in Tuesday by Speaker John A. Boehner.

headline.main: Oregon Democrat Sworn In to House
